title: Home | Abbey Credit Union
text: top of page Abbey is CLOSED today (Monday, January 26th) due to winter weather All Abbey branches are CLOSED today (Monday, January 26th). Please utilize our online and mobile banking services. Stay warm and safe, everyone! Member Notice Please be aware that scheduled system maintenance will occur during the late-night hours of Saturday, January 17th, into early Sunday. Members may experience temporary interruptions to services such as online banking and card transactions during this time. We appreciate your patience while this maintenance is performed. November 27th Thanksgiving - CLOSED December 24th Christmas Eve - 9am - 1pm December 25th Christmas Day - CLOSED Holiday Hours December 31st New Years Eve - 9am - 1pm January 1st New Year's Day - CLOSED Unbank yourself Established in 1937 and 14,000 Members strong. Abbey Credit Union is a not-for-profit financial cooperative, which means when you open an account, you’re not just a member, you’re an owner. Join and become an owner When you open an account, you’re a part-owner. That means you have a voice, a vote, and a stake in our success. Your deposits help fellow members Your money stays local. Funding car loans, home loans, and more for people right here in your community. Profits go back to you, not shareholders We’re not-for-profit, any extra earnings come back to you through better rates, fewer fees, and member rewards. We invest in our community From local schools to small businesses and community programs, when you bank with Abbey, you’re helping your neighbors thrive.
